name: Online Clock
tag_list: alarm, clock, alarm-clock, online-alarm-clock, onlineclock-net, online-alarm
overview:
OnlineClock.net was created in early 2006 and is the worldâ€™s most popular website devoted to simply being an online alarm clock.

Since going online with its original online alarm clock, Online Clock has expanded to create other free useful clock tools including an online stopwatch, an online countdown, a binary clock and even the world’s first online version of a clock radio.

All of Online Clock’s clock and time tools can be used for free directly in your web browser.

In addition, Online Clock has created a frequently updated blog containing articles related to the themes of clocks, alarms and time in general. The Alarm Clock Blog, as it is called, often reviews the newest alarm clock gadgets created by innovative designers.
